terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.footer: By using StyleAdvisor AI, you agree to these terms.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using StyleAdvisor AI, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

services.title: 2. Our Services
services.content: StyleAdvisor AI provides AI-powered fashion analysis and styling recommendations. Our service analyzes photos and text descriptions to provide personalized outfit suggestions and shopping recommendations.

userContent.title: 3. User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of any photos or content you upload. By uploading content, you grant us a license to use it for providing our services. We do not share your personal photos with third parties.

premium.title: 4. Premium Subscription
premium.content: Premium features require a paid subscription. Subscriptions auto-renew unless cancelled. Refunds are subject to the applicable app store policies.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Our fashion recommendations are for informational purposes only. We are not responsible for purchasing decisions made based on our suggestions.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account for violations of these terms. You may delete your account at any time through the app settings.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.gdprText: We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with GDPR regulations.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly, including account details, photos for analysis, style preferences, and wardrobe items. We also collect usage data to improve our services.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use your data to provide personalized style recommendations, improve our AI models, send notifications you've opted into, and process payments for premium features.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share anonymized data with partners to improve our services. Affiliate links may track purchases for commission purposes.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption and secure servers. Photos are processed securely and are not stored longer than necessary.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can export your data or request account deletion through the app settings.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience and analyze app usage. You can manage your preferences in the app settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy inquiries, contact us at privacy@styleadvisor.ai. We aim to respond within 30 days.

affiliate.title: Affiliate Disclosure
affiliate.heading: How We Make Money
affiliate.intro: StyleAdvisor AI participates in affiliate marketing programs. This means we may earn commissions when you purchase products through links in our app.
affiliate.howItWorksContent: When we recommend products, some may include affiliate links. If you click and make a purchase, we receive a small commission at no extra cost to you.

bullets.commission: We earn a small commission from qualifying purchases
bullets.prices: Prices are the same whether you use our links or not
bullets.honest: Our recommendations are based on style analysis, not commission rates
bullets.support: Your purchases help support the development of StyleAdvisor AI

affiliate.closing: We only recommend products we believe will genuinely help your style. Thank you for supporting StyleAdvisor AI!
